titleStmt.title: Christs birth not mis-timed: or, A cleare refutation of a resolution to a question about the time of Christ's nativity. By R.S. Pretending to evidence by scripture, that, Iesus Christ was not borne in December.
titleStmt.author: R. S.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Royston, in Ivie-lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
